ChunkText: if you have been offered a graduate assistantship by your department, please carefully review the information below to learn more about what to expect upon your arrival to umbc.
ContextBefore: graduate assistantships ta, ra assistantships are a great way for graduate students to help fund their studies, however, positions are competitive and funded by individual departments. if you are interested in an assistantship, please contact your department to find out what opportunities may be available.
ContextAfter: planning your budget and expenses initial costs upon arrival to umbc because of the timing required to process payroll paperwork, graduate assistants do not usually receive their first paycheck until typically 6 weeks, or possibly longer, after beginning the payroll process with their department.
